DOC.brief_summary: A 12-year follow-up 166 woman fibromyalgia ( FM ) chronic widespread pain ( CWP ) western Sweden . The 166 woman participate Randomised Controlled Trial call GAU 2004-2005 , aim investigate effect pool exercise patient education . The primary aim present study examine change symptom 11-12 year 166 woman FM CWP also investigate predictor change symptom work ability . The 166 woman ask participate present follow-up study . The follow-up examination comprises standardise interview symptom demographic variable , battery self-administered questionnaire test physical function .
DOC.brief_title: 12-years Follow-up 166 Female Patients With Fibromyalgia Chronic Widespread Pain
DOC.detailed_description: A 12-year follow-up 166 woman fibromyalgia ( FM ) chronic widespread pain ( CWP ) . The 166 woman participate Randomised Controlled Trial call GAU 2004-2005 three city western Sweden ; Göteborg , Alingsås Uddevalla . The RCT aim investigate effect pool exercise patient education . The primary aim present study examine change symptom 11-12 year 166 woman FM CWP also investigate predictor change symptom work ability . The 166 woman contact mail telephone , ask participate present follow-up study . The follow-up examination comprises standardise interview symptom demographic variable , battery self-administered questionnaire test physical function .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria present study GAUU : All 166 patient participate study GAU 2004/2005 . ( The inclusion criterion GAU woman FM CWP , 1860 year old . Patients widespread pain ; pain right leave side body , waist , well axial pain , least three month classify chronic widespread pain ( CWP ) . Patients fulfil criterion CWP also pain palpation least 11 18 predefined tender point classify fibromyalgia ( FM ) . Exclusion criterion GAU serious physical psychological disease ) Exclusion Criteria present study GAUU : Patients develop serious physical psychological disease since participate GAU 2004/2005
